description: Voyage farther in the KÜHL Navigatr™ Pant featuring odor-resistant fabric with 4-way stretch and DWR to keep you fresher, longer. Signature touches like KÜHL's FreeRyde™ waistband, gusseted crotch and abundant pockets are paired with innovative features like the hidden passport pocket. Shorter inseam hits at ankle. UPF 50+ provides sun protection.
name: Kuhl Navigatr Pants, 32" Inseam - Mens
